articles.title: Marked as 'innovative leaders', 32 Singaporean millennials and Gen-Zers on Forbes' 30 Under 30 Asia list - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — For Singaporean millennial Marilyn Chew, a tiny pursuit in the arts and a personal gesture while she was abroad later morphed to become a Singapore-based business she started on her own called Eterate Calligraphy.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE DBS, StanChart weigh bids as Citi retreats from Asia consumer business - sources - Reuters
articles.description: Banks including DBS Group (DBSM.SI), Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG), OCBC (OCBC.SI) and Standard Chartered (STAN.L) are set to bid for parts of Citigroup's (C.N) consumer business in Asia, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.
articles.content: A view of the exterior of the Citibank corporate headquarters in New York, New York, U.S. May 20, 2015. REUTERS/Mike Segar/File PhotoBanks including DBS Group (DBSM.SI), Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Grou… [+4210 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: DBS, StanChart among potential bidders for Citi's Asia consumer business - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE/HONG KONG: Banks including DBS Group, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG), OCBC and Standard Chartered are set to bid for parts of Citigroup's consumer business in Asia, people with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.
